_header: O dreadful death come make and end
_description: James Ryman, a longing for Death — two stanzas rhyme royal

CULEe112.First Lines:
O dredefull deth come make an endeCome vnto me & do thy
                    cure…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…And take my soule into thy blisWhereof the Ioye shall neuir
                    mys
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 267-8.
